Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains repeated code in static methods to be used by the whole program

        public static boolean checkInputAreAlpha(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        Method that takes multiple Strings, each of which that need to be checked that they only contain alphabetical characters
        Parameters:
        list - multiple strings stored to be checked
        Returns:

      • saveSculpture

        public static void saveSculpture(Sculpture newSculpture,
                                 int year,
                                 double reservePrice,
                                 int bids,
                                 int width,
                                 int height,
                                 int depth,
                                 java.lang.String creatorName,
                                 int userId,
                                 java.lang.String material,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String desc,
                                 int id,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> picLocation,
                                 Bid bid)
        Method that saves values entered in the gui to the sculpture object
        Parameters:
        newSculpture - Reference to the object the values are being saved too
        year - value of the year the object was created
        reservePrice - value of the reserve price of this object
        title - Title of this artwork
        height - Height value in cm of this artwork
        bids - Number of bids allowed on this object
        creatorName - Name of the person who created this artwork
        width - Width value in cm of this artwork
        depth - Depth value in cm of this Sculpture
        material - Name of the main material this Sculpture is made of
        userId - Username of the person selling this artwork
        desc - A brief description of the artwork
        id - Identifier value of the artwork
        bid - bid id for this sculpture
        picLocation - list of locations of pictures for this sculpture

      • savePainting

        public static void savePainting(Painting newPainting,
                                int year,
                                double reservePrice,
                                int bids,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                java.lang.String creatorName,
                                int userId,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String desc,
                                int id,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> picLocation,
                                Bid bid)
        Method that saves values entered in the gui to a painting object
        Parameters:
        newPainting - The reference to an object to save the values too
        year - Value of the year this artwork was created
        reservePrice - Value of the minimum price this artwork can be sold for
        bids - Maximum number of bids allowed on this artwork
        width - Value of the width of this artwork in cm's
        height - Value of the height of this artwork in cm's
        creatorName - name of the person who created this painting
        userId - username of the person selling this artwork
        title - Name of this artwork
        desc - Brief description of what this artwork is
        id - Identifier value of this artwork
        picLocation - list of pictures for this painting
        bid - bid id for this painting

      • saveUser

        public static void saveUser(UserProfiles profile,
                            java.lang.String userName,
                            java.lang.String fName,
                            java.lang.String lName,
                            java.lang.String phoneNum,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> address,
                            java.lang.String postcode,
                            java.lang.String profilePicture,
                            int id)
        Method that updates a userprofile based on values entered in the gui
        Parameters:
        profile - reference to the user profile being edited
        userName - display name of this user account
        fName - first name of the user of this account
        lName - last name of the user of this account
        phoneNum - phone number of the user of this account
        address - address of the user of this account, split by seperate lines
        postcode - post code of where the user of this account lives
        profilePicture - Image of the user/ to represent the user
        id - identifier value of this user account

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True or false if the phone number passes validation
